title: Comedy Talk, Bill Gates, Vegans, Flatulence and more.
itunes:title: Comedy Talk, Bill Gates, Vegans, Flatulence and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! The show starts off without the ladies and the 3 amigos lose their minds. Uncle Steve makes a must see recommendation in Comedy Speak. Is 50 Cent banned from IG for real? T.I. and Tiny will appear on Red Table Talk with Jada Pinkett-Smith. Bill Gates is the richest man in America with $110 billion. The crew talks about sick days and how to utilize them. A vegan wants to take Burger King to court over a burger dispute. California had a state of emergency earlier this month and on live television its congressman was in a state of flatulence. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog talks about how God can gradually change the desire of your heart and so much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
